sources.full: RetardedMermaid's Guide To The Out There

optionalfeature.name: Tongue Of The Masked One
entries: You gain advantage on any saving throw against poison damage or {@condition poisoned}. You gain an accute sense of smell which lets you easily identify and follow odours and recognise people in disguise. You can track by scent and the base DC of any track test you make is 5 regardless of the terrain, increased by +2 for each day old the track is. You can detect poisoned food, drink and objects, and even strong emotions like anger and fear. Additionally, you can speak with snakes and reptiles of animal intelligence, and they react friendly towards you. This doesn't include magical beasts. At 6th level, you are able to smell magical auras, like a detect magic spell.

optionalfeature.name: Scales Of The Jormungand
entries: You can cast armor of Agathys at will without spending a spell slot or material component; while the spell is active, your body becomes covered and translucent scales that seem to be made of ice and are just as cold to the touch. You also become immune to natural cold, and you have advantage on all saving throws against cold damage.
